snippet: Carlos Slim Helú, the richest man in the world, has his son working on a deal that will send Rafael Marquez from the Red Bulls to León in the Mexican league.
abstract: Carlos Slim Helu, richest man in the world, has his son working on a deal that will send New York Red Bulls midfielder Rafael Marquez to Leon in the Mexican soccer league.
lead_paragraph: Carlos Slim Helú, the richest man in the world, has his son working on a deal that will send Rafael Marquez from the Red Bulls to León in the Mexican league.

headline.seo: Mexican Soccer Team León Seeks Rafael Marquez
